module:
development.folder="dvlp">
module, class, library, schematic element, symbolization
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record a symbolization relationship between a schematic element and a thing that is symbolizes. An application program can use a symbolization relationship to provide access to information. A user may select a schematic element within a schematic drawing in order to access information about the thing that is symbolized.
the definition of a schematic element;
the identification of a schematic element within a library so that it can be referenced from outside the library;
the definition of a schematic element by reference to an external library;
a symbolization relationship between a schematic element in a library and the thing that it symbolizes.
the occurrence of a schematic element on a drawing. The occurrence of a schematic element on a drawing is within the scope of the Schematic drawing application module.
The Symbolization_by_schematic_element UoF specifies a symbolization relationship between a schematic element and a symbolized thing.
The relationship may indicate:
each individual physical realisation of the schematic element symbolizes the thing; or
each individual physical realisation of the schematic element symbolizes a member or subclass of the thing, which shall be a class in this case.
symbolization_by_schematic_element 1209
symbolized_item.item 1209 symbolization_by_schematic_element<= presented_item_representation presented_item_representation.item-> presented_item=> symbolized_item symbolized_item.item
presented_item_representation.presentation 46 symbolization_by_schematic_element<= presented_item_representation presented_item_representation.presentation
symbolization_of_member_or_subclass_by_schematic_element 1209
symbolized_class.item 1209 symbolization_of_member_or_subclass_by_schematic_element<= presented_item_representation presented_item_representation.item-> presented_item=> symbolized_item symbolized_item.item
presented_item_representation.presentation 46 symbolization_of_member_or_subclass_by_schematic_element<= presented_item_representation presented_item_representation.presentation
